effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.platinum: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.
flavor_text.platinum: The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well.
